articles.title: Pat Finn, US actor in TV shows Friends and The Middle, dies at 60 - BBC
articles.description: Finn was also improvisation performer and appeared in various sitcoms throughout the 1990s and 2000s.

articles.title: Renowned Palestinian actor and director Mohammed Bakri dies at 72 - CNN
articles.description: Renowned actor and director Mohammad Bakri died Wednesday at the age of 72, according to his family. Bakri had been suffering from heart problems. His funeral was held the same day in his town of birth, al-Bi’neh, in northern Israel.

articles.title: Imani Smith, Former ‘Lion King’ Broadway Actress, Dies in Alleged Homicide - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "Imani had her whole life ahead of her. She was a vivacious, loving and fiercely talented person," Smith's aunt, Kira Helper, wrote on GoFundMe.

articles.title: AEW Dynamite on 34th Street Preview – Takeshita vs. Cassidy, Dynamite Diamond Ring Final, MJF Returns to Action, More - AEW
articles.description: We are back in the historic Hammerstein Ballroom in New York City for AEW Dynamite on 34th Street! This special Christmas Eve edition begins at 6 p.m. ET/5 p.m. CT on TBS and streaming on HBO Max, just three days from AEW Worlds End in Chicago on PPV!
